content.value: Creating a new system for the global financial supply chain is only possible through the collaboration of a global community of organizations, groups and individuals. We want to encourage the exchange of ideas and build Centrifuge as an inclusive, welcoming, and safe community.
Our Slack Community is a place where you can meet, chat and explore.
Any harmful or discriminating behavior will not be tolerated and will result in the offending person(s) being expelled from the community.
For further details have a look at Centrifuge's Â
